section.title: Open vSwitch (OVS) Metrics
section.para: A list of metrics associated with the OVS service.

note.para: For information on how to turn these metrics on and off using the tuning knobs, see .

entry.screen: service=networking resource_id component=ovs router_name port_id

entry.para: Inbound bytes per second for the router (if network_use_bits is false)

entry.screen: service=networking resource_id tenant_id component=ovs router_name port_id

entry.para: Incoming packets per second for the router

entry.screen: service=networking resource_id component=ovs router_name port_id

entry.para: Outgoing bytes per second for the router (if network_use_bits is false)
